thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com
thread.title: Charles Kriley

author: Charles Kriley
title: Charles Kriley
text: I know people are always suspicious of any type of online company but they literally just saved me over $900 dollars. I've been planning a trip to Ireland for me and my two cousins. Tickets were over $900 a piece. By using the FlightHub alert app I was able to purchase each ticket at $601 each. I now have extra money for my hotels, car and activities! I'm extremely satisfied with FlightHub and highly recommend it for anyone that is traveling!
